chapter.ara-name: باب الثَّمَرِ الْمُعَلَّقِ يُسْرَقُ
chapter.eng-name: Fruits on the tree that are Stolen

chapter.ara-name: باب الثَّمَرِ يُسْرَقُ بَعْدَ أَنْ يُئْوِيَهُ الْجَرِينُ
chapter.eng-name: Stealing Fruit after it has been put in the place where it is stored to dry

chapter.ara-name: باب قَطْعِ الرِّجْلِ مِنَ السَّارِقِ بَعْدَ الْيَدِ
chapter.eng-name: Cutting off the thief's foot after his hand .

chapter.ara-name: باب قَطْعِ الْيَدَيْنِ وَالرِّجْلَيْنِ مِنَ السَّارِقِ
chapter.eng-name: Cutting off the hands and feet of the thief

chapter.ara-name: باب الْقَطْعِ فِي السَّفَرِ
chapter.eng-name: Cutting (The thief's hand off) while traveling

chapter.ara-name: باب حَدِّ الْبُلُوغِ وَذِكْرِ السِّنِّ الَّذِي إِذَا بَلَغَهَا الرَّجُلُ وَالْمَرْأَةُ أُقِيمَ عَلَيْهِمَا الْحَدُّ
chapter.eng-name: Definition of Puberty and the age at which the Hadd punishment May be carried out on a man or a woman

chapter.ara-name: باب تَعْلِيقِ يَدِ السَّارِقِ فِي عُنُقِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Hanging the thief's hand from his neck
